CustomField.description: Shows the MTD value if Financial Year is last year. Will be used in the MTD Last Year in reports.
CustomField.formula: IF( Current_Last_Year__c ="LAST YEAR",CASE( MONTH(TODAY()),1, Jan_Revenue_Amount__c, 2, Feb_Revenue_Amount__c,3, Mar_Revenue_Amount__c,4, Apr_Revenue_Amount__c,5, May_Revenue_Amount__c, 6, Jun_Revenue_Amount__c, 7, Jul_Revenue_Amount__c, 8, Aug_Revenue_Amount__c, 9,Sep_Revenue_Amount__c, 10, Nov_Revenue_Amount__c, 11, Nov_Revenue_Amount__c, 12, Dec_Revenue_Amount__c,0 ),0)
CustomField.label: MTD Actual Last Year
